programme.title: The Sacrament
programme.desc: A mysterious rural utopia quickly becomes evident that this paradise may not be as it seems.

programme.title: Shrooms
programme.desc: Five American college students experience a particularly bad trip while vacationing in Ireland.

programme.title: The Evil Next Door
programme.desc: Shirin moves into a new home with her partner, and his son Lucas. Shirin realizes that they are haunted by an evil that wants Lucas at any cost.

programme.title: Marrowbone
programme.desc: Four young siblings vow to stay together when their mother dies. But when a ghostly presence torments them and a lawyer threatens their pact, the four must stand together or be torn apart forever.

programme.title: The Eclipse
programme.desc: Michael Farr (Ciaran Hinds), a teacher raising his two kids alone since his wife died two years earlier, has been seeing and hearing strange things late at night.

programme.title: Alone
programme.desc: A grief-stricken young widow flees the city to cope with the loss of her husband. When she's kidnapped by a man and locked in a cabin, she escapes into the wilderness and is pursued by her captor.

programme.title: Held
programme.desc: A married couple is held hostage by an unseen, menacing stranger. The situation becomes brutal and they must work together to uncover the truth and find a way out before it‚Äôs too late.

programme.title: Vanishing on 7th Street
programme.desc: A strange blackout causes a city's population to vanish. As the days grow shorter a handful of survivors realize their only hope is to escape the haunted darkness. Starring Hayden Christensen.

programme.title: Mutant Chronicles
programme.desc: In the year 2707, war rages between Earth’s four giant corporations as they battle over the planet’s dwindling resources.

programme.title: The ABCs of Death
programme.desc: A 26-chapter anthology that showcases death in all its vicious wonder and brutal beauty.

programme.title: Stage Fright
programme.desc: A snobby musical theater camp is terrorized by a blood-thirsty killer who hates musical theater.

programme.title: George A. Romero's Survival of the Dead
programme.desc: Residents fight a zombie epidemic while hoping for a cure to return their relatives back to their human state.

programme.title: Synchronicity
programme.desc: A sci-fi thriller about a physicist who has uncovered the secret of time travel. To protect his discovery, he must travel back in time and endangers his own existence and the very fabric of reality.

programme.title: Amulet
programme.desc: Tomaz, an ex-soldier is living in a decaying house, inhabited by a young woman and her dying mother. He starts to fall for his new companion but cannot ignore his suspicion that something insidious might also be living alongside them.

programme.title: The Ones Below
programme.desc: A young affluent couple expecting their first child hits it off with the new couple that moves in downstairs, until a dinner party between them ends in a shocking accident.
